Training
[i]Fearless Learning [/i]– Whenever a noncreature source you control deals damage to one or more of your opponents, if that damage is greater than Ewan's power, double his power until end of turn.
[i]Young Apprentice[/i] – Whenever you cast a noncreature spell with mana value 2 or more, put a +1/+1 counter onto Ewan, Enthusiastic Student.
